channel.title: 317 help! quest and emotes
channel.description:
so, when ever i make a new character on my server, it has all the quests complete for me. I have the quests coded, and if i reset quests in the character file manually they can do the quest (bad grammer there sorry). How would I code to make the quests to make them incomplete when a new character is created? when q1 == 0 is incomplete and q1 == 15 is complete... I have 9 quests allready codded into my server.
Thanks for your help in advance!
Oh and another question. I have skillcape emotes codded into my server, yet i have no idea how to activate the emote becuase there is no "skilllcape" emote butten in my emote section :(
Thanks again lol

item.title: 317 help! quest and emotes
item.dc:creator: @dream21 dream21
item.description:
@dream21 wrote:

public int q1 = 0;
public int q2 = 0;
public int q3 = 0;
public int q4 = 0;
public int q5 = 0;
public int q6 = 0;
public int q7 = 0;
public int q8 = 0;
public int q9 = 0;
is in player.java, and still when i make a new character all quests are complete i want them to be complete this sucks!

@coon hunter, then how do i activiate the skillcape emotes? Thanks so much again

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help! quest and emotes
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Typically this is in Player.java
public int q1 = 15;

Change that to 0.

About emotes, that is programmed in, buttons do not automatically know what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 help! quest and emotes
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

When a new character is created certain values are saved with it…

in this case q1 is saved as 15 or something

so basicly search for the code where your q1 = 15;

Read full topic
